996530.name: Fantasy Grounds - Creature Collection Revised (PFRPG)
996530.description:
Creature Collection Revised

New Monsters of Myth and Legend
From the horrible wrack dragon to the tiny bottle imp, creatures frightening and wondrous are found throughout the lands of fantasy. Discover your favorites anew in the complete revision of the original d20 bestseller,
Creature Collection!
Creature Collection Revisedpresents all the original monsters and races in stunning new detail. Over 200 creatures in this book are ready to be introduced to your campaign, each having been painstakingly updated to mesh perfectly with the rules.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Scott Ferguson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
